description: The standard mass production mobile suit of the Earth Alliance forces. The Dagger L is an improved version of the Dagger series introduced during the previous war, and it inherits the Strike Gundam`s ability to adapt to various combat situations using interchangeable Striker packs. On Earth, these machines are typically equipped with Jet Striker packs that render them capable of atmospheric flight. A black version known as the Dark Dagger L is also employed by special forces such as Phantom Pain.
name: GAT-02L2 Dagger L
